text: Ware ga shito o tsukawashita no wa, tada arrā no o yurushi no moto ni fukujū, kie sa seru tamedearu. Moshi kare-ra ga machigatta toki anata no moto ni kite, arrā no o yōsha o negai, shito ga, kare-ra no tame ni o yurushi o inorunaraba, kare-ra wa arrā ga, tabitabi yurusa reru okata, jihibukai okata de ara reru koto ga wakarudearou
